name: Wish Bearer
description:
Wish Bearer is a 3D Adventure Platformer set in a magical fantasy world that has been consumed by destructive floods, time and time again.

 In this game you will be exploring various minimalistic ruins contained within a deep endless ocean, gathering various crystals and wishes and navigating various challenges in the forms of traps and platforms.

With simple platforming and a short abstracted narrative, Wish Bearer aims to be an enjoyable, relaxing experience.

Wish Bearer has a fixed camera perspective utilising different angles and shots to create a pleasant experience.

Wish Bearer ultimately is a story about overcoming personal challenges when it feels like the whole world is against you, where you can’t see a way out but have to keep pushing forward.
